bioconda.name: polystest
bioconda.summary: Interactive tool for statistical testing, data browsing and interactive visualization of quantitative omics data

biocontainers.name: polystest
biocontainers.summary: Interactive tool for statistical testing, data browsing and interactive visualization of quantitative omics data

biotools.summary: Robust statistical testing of quantitative proteomics data. The tool comprises and combines different tests and includes a new method for combined statistics of quantitative and missing values.

bioschemas.name: PolySTest
bioschemas.summary: Robust statistical testing of quantitative proteomics data. The tool comprises and combines different tests and includes a new method for combined statistics of quantitative and missing values.
